title: Indonesian cuisine
creator_credit: Ivan Gaal and Victoria. Education Dept. Curriculum Branch
brief_description: Focusing on a family of Indonesian immigrants and their Indonesian student guest, this program shows how Indonesians in Australia seek to preserve their culture through their cuisine and through cultural events which demonstrate their music, dress and customs.
